dcterms:creator: Gary B Huang
Marwan Mattar
Tamara Berg
Eric Learned-Miller
dcterms:description: A database for studying face recognition in unconstrained environments, exhibiting natural pose variations, focus, lighting, resolution, make-up, occlusions, background, facial expression, age, gender, race, accessories, and photographic quality variations.
dcterms:title: LFW (Labeled Faces in the Wild)

dcterms:creator: Tianyue Zheng
Weihong Deng
Jiani Hu
dcterms:description: A database for studying cross-age face recognition in unconstrained environments, consisting of positive face aging pairs.
dcterms:title: CA-LFW (Cross-Age LFW)

dcterms:creator: Tianyue Zheng
Weihong Deng
dcterms:description: A database for studying cross-pose face recognition in unconstrained environments, extending the LFW dataset with pose-related images.
dcterms:title: CP-LFW (Cross-Pose LFW)

dcterms:creator: Stylianos Moschoglou
Athanasios Papaioannou
Christos Sagonas
Jiankang Deng
Irene Kotsia
Stefanos Zafeiriou
dcterms:description: The first manually collected, in-the-wild age database, containing images of various individuals across a wide age range.
dcterms:title: Age-DB

dcterms:creator: Soumyadip Sengupta
Jun-Cheng Chen
Carlos Castillo
Vishal M Patel
Rama Chellappa
David W Jacobs
dcterms:description: A dataset for frontal to profile face verification in the wild, containing pairs of frontal and profile images.
dcterms:title: CFP-FP (Cross-Age Frontal-Profile)

dcterms:creator: Soumyadip Sengupta
Jun-Cheng Chen
Carlos Castillo
Vishal M Patel
Rama Chellappa
David W Jacobs
dcterms:description: A dataset for frontal to frontal face verification in the wild, containing pairs of frontal images.
dcterms:title: CFP-FF (Cross-Age Frontal-Full)

dcterms:creator: Qiong Cao
Li Shen
Weidi Xie
Omkar M Parkhi
Andrew Zisserman
dcterms:description: A dataset for recognizing faces across pose and age, designed for face recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: VGG2-FP

dcterms:description: A dataset containing images of celebrities collected from various sources on the internet, used for training face recognition models.
dcterms:title: Face Scrub

dcterms:creator: Zheng Zhu
Guan Huang
Jiankang Deng
Yun Ye
Junjie Huang
Xinze Chen
Jiagang Zhu

dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset unveiling the power of million-scale deep face recognition, containing 260 million face images.
dcterms:title: WebFace260M
